caption: STIX Tool
description: The Tool object characterizes the properties of these software tools and can be used as a basis for making an assertion about how a Threat Actor uses them during an attack. It contains properties to name and describe the tool, a list of Kill Chain Phases the tool can be used to carry out, and the version of the tool as defined in STIX 2.1 STIX Domain Objects (SDOs). This object MUST NOT be used to characterize malware. Further, STIX Tool MUST NOT be used to characterize tools used as part of a course of action in response to an attack.
name: stix_tool

name.description: A name used to identify the Tool.

desc.description: A description that provides more details and context about the Tool, potentially including its purpose and its key characteristics.

types.caption: Tool Types
types.description: The kind(s) of tool(s) being described. The values for this property SHOULD come from the tool-type-ov open vocabulary.

aliases.description: Alternative names used to identify this Tool.

kill_chain.caption: Kill Chain Phases
kill_chain.description: The list of kill chain phases for which this Tool can be used.

release.caption: Tool Version
release.description: The version identifier associated with the Tool.
